 Vertex sorting.
Copying @c fastjet::PseudoJet
The following function suite provides deep copies of fastjet::PseudoJet objects, including an actual copy of ParticleInfo (instead of a sharing this one between the original and the copy).

Single object copy:

Parameters:
[in] inJet reference to non-modifiable fastjet::PseudoJet to be copied
inout] outJet reference to modifiable fastjet::PseudoJet object
Multiple object copies:

Parameters:
[in] inJets reference to list of non-modifiable fastjet::PseudoJet objects to be copied
inout] outJets reference to modifiable list of fastjet::PseudoJet objects to be filled with copies
Warning:
These implementations should be stripped of the deep copy feature, as sharing the ParticleInfo should be ok anyway. This is mainly true because the ParticleInfo object can not be modified after its instantiation anyway - meaning its data content can not be overwritten/changed.

Detailed Description

Collection of useful functions supporting object copying and others.

) [static]

Conditional copying: exclusively copy only charged or neutral particles from the same source from list of fastjet::PseudoJet objects.

Parameters:
[in] type specification of requested source
[in] charged if true only charged particles are copied, else only neutrals are copied.
